Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add manual payout method system with Venmo, PayPal, Zelle, Cash App support

Replace Stripe Connect payout system with simpler manual payout tracking.
Users can now set their preferred payout method (Venmo, PayPal, Zelle, Cash App)
in their profile settings. Pool admins mark payouts as sent after transferring
funds via the recipient''s chosen method.

- Add payout method API endpoint for CRUD operations
- Add PayoutMethodForm component for selecting payout preferences  
- Add PoolOnboardingModal for payment + payout setup after joining
- Update payouts route to use manual payout flow
- Add payout method section to settings page
- Update User model with payoutMethod field

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(Available" even when the admin had set up payment methods in their 
personal settings. This was because the system only checked pool-specific
adminPaymentMethods, which were never populated.

Now the API falls back to the pool admin''s personal payoutMethods from
the User collection when pool-specific methods aren''t set.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add allowed payment methods selection for pool creation

Admins can now select which payment methods (Venmo, Cash App, PayPal,
Zelle) are allowed when creating a pool. All methods are checked by
default. When joining a pool, users see which payment methods are
accepted and can only choose from the allowed options for their payout.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
